MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD5 & TD6 postcode areas of Kelso and Melrose, affecting properties in surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.33pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:15pm on the 9th November 2020.
